title: Durarara!! - Big Shizuo, Little Izaya (Doujinshi)
description:
Pairing: Shizuo x Izaya

When Shizuo catches him, Izaya changes himself to escape... and ends up becoming an adorable child.

altTitles.ja-ro: Durarara!! - Dekkai Shizuo to Chitchai Izaya no Hon (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: デュラララ!! - でっかい静雄とちっちゃい臨也の本。(Doujinshi)
